field.name: summary
field.value: When intercepting COM object's interface, invocation.Target and other properties are null

field.name: description
field.value: When a proxy with target interface is created and target object is a com object, when members on that proxy are intercepted, invocation has null values for several properties that should not be null. See attached screenshot.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: OK, turns out I'm being stupid. DP works as expected, the interface is not implemented by the proxy target so the values should be null.
